description:
Do you still configure your builds manually through a User Interface? In this session Guilherme Ferreira, the invited speaker, will explore the Build as Code concept and will use Cake, a build automation solution based on C#, to help. 
Agenda:
• Welcome
• Build Automation in a DevOps way! by Guilherme Ferreira
• Coffee/Networking break
• Open space
• Closing
name: DevOps Porto #22: Build Automation in a DevOps way!
